00021 namespace boost {
00022 namespace xint {
00023 namespace blockable {
00024 
00026 integer random_by_size(size_t bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool
00027     can_be_negative)
00028 {
00029     try {
00030         return integer(core::random_by_size(bits, high_bit_on, low_bit_on,
00031             can_be_negative));
00032     } catch (std::exception&) {
00033         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00034         return integer::nan();
00035     }
00036 }
